kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.doc: Converts the given item to a floating point number.

kw.name: Verify select gold price by country and weight
Verify select item from drop down list by label
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//div[@id='goldchange']//select[@class='form-control gold-silver']' by label Gold.

kw.name: List Selection Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies selection list ``locator`` has ``expected`` options selected.
kw.msg: Verifying list 'xpath=//div[@id='goldchange']//select[@class='form-control gold-silver']' has option [ Gold ] selected.

Log
kw.arg: Price of ${gold1} is higher than price of ${gold2}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
